actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to enable domestic growers or canners of seasonal fruits or vegetables or of fruit juices, fruit nectars, or fruit drinks prepared from such seasonal fruits, which were packed in hermetically sealed containers and sterilized by heat, to secure an adjudication of certain claims for losses in the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Enables domestic growers or canners of seasonal fruits or vegetables or of fruit juices, fruit nectars, or fruit drinks prepared from such seasonal fruits, which were packed in hermetically sealed containers and sterilized by heat, to secure an adjudication of specified claims for losses in the Court of Claims.

titles.title: A bill to enable domestic growers or canners of seasonal fruits or vegetables or of fruit juices, fruit nectars, or fruit drinks prepared from such seasonal fruits, which were packed in hermetically sealed containers and sterilized by heat, to secure an adjudication of certain claims for losses in the Court of Claims.
